attributes.action: give EMA to year 10's and 11's to raise school atendence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think that if you give EMA to year elven and ten students if they go to school for the whole week with no late marks and if they do not mess around in classes they will come to school more often and raise school attendence in england

love natalie
xxx
